entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing drizzle changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:48 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 12:48 PM ADT Sunday 26 March 2023
